# Anwar Baig

| birth_place      = Peshawar, British India
| sport            = Men's field hockey
| country          =
| medaltemplates   =
}}
Anwar Baig (born November 1924) was a Pakistani field hockey player who was a member of the Pakistan men's national field hockey team. He played six matches for Pakistan at the 1948 Summer Olympics, which placed fourth in the hockey competition.
